    @allure.step("Click Edit button at index {index}")
    def click_edit_employee(self, index=0):
        index=int(index)
        edit_btns = self.driver.find_elements(*self.edit_buttons)
        if len(edit_btns) > index:
            edit_btns[index].click()
            logger.info(f"Clicked Edit button at index {index}")
            WebDriverWait(self.driver, self.timeout).until(EC.visibility_of_element_located(self.job_title_input))
